title: RIOT I DEMAND AN ANSWER
body: My main account is literally getting chat restricted for no reason. I am not recieving any reports, I am praising other players and be a positive player, offering to fill roles ie support. I have had a 20 game, 15 game, 25 game and currently another 15 game restriction this week. I have sunk a lot of money into this game and demand to know why I keep getting restricted? Is there any way of resetting the behaviour limit because as it currently stands, you are forcing me to break the rules and buy another account
